overview:
Sagomas is your creative and dynamic partner for the development of amazing applications for iPhone and Smartphone

Sagomas is born of an international partnership based principally on the concept of outsourcing and so we do not know the meaning of limits or borders. We develop high quality projects for innovative companies and whoever wants to realize interesting ideas that could “shake upâ€œ the market. Due to a team of professionals with over 15 years of experiences concerning programming, design, advertisement and marketing, Sagomas will offer you a product that includes perfect technologies and really combines design and functionality in order to satisfy every clients need. So if you have any great ideas don’t hesitate to contact us: we do make it become real.
